thread.section_title: Reservation Counter Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Reservation Counter | reservationcounter.com | 16 of 1177
thread.title: Charles

author: Charles
title: Charles
text:
I have stayed at this facility numerous times over the last couple of months and find a very courteous staff. the breakfast could be more but that is ok I would like to see some donuts as a choice as well as a choice for the continental breakfast.
the rooms are immaculate and well kept I always look forward in my stay there although it is only one night a week or every two weeks
